product_name: Patagonia Baby Capilene 1 Silkweight Set - Infant/Toddler Boys'
long_description: As cooling sun protection or soft insulated layering, the stretchy and breathable Patagonia Baby Capilene 1 Silkweight Set for infant/toddler boys covers all the bases. Made of 59% polyester, 35% recycled polyester and 6% spandex fabric, both quick-drying pieces have 50+ UPF sun protection and Polygiene(R) permanent odor control. Bodysuit features a rib-knit neck and side panels that extend through the underarms and sleeves; an adjustable side-snap feature allows 1.5 in. more growing room. Pants have an elasticized waistband and gusset panel for added mobility and extra diaper space.
